content.rendered:
The Office of Information Security, a division of the Office of Information Technology (OIT) is committed to securing the University of La Verne’s Information Security posture through strategies, policies, and awareness.

The Office of Information Security has implemented a Phishing Awareness campaign to increase our overall security posture. The purpose of the campaign is to send phishing emails to our Faculty and Staff in an effort to educate about real world threats. Should you receive any kind of Phishing email, report the email using the “Report Phishing” option in Outlook.

If you suspect that an @laverne.edu email address is involved in any malicious activity, please email abuse@laverne.edu
